price: 111. And I know not, perhaps it may be a trial for you, and an enjoyment for a while.
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-in adrī laʿallahu fit'natun lakum wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
